function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of respiratory droplets containing contagious diseases","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases and potential infection of individuals within transmission range","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce droplet transmission distance and evaporation time","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, and masks","People":"Individuals in close proximity to a person talking or emitting droplets","Owner":"Health authorities, building owners, and individuals"}]}
